segments.text: The dinner was really good . It knocked my socks off .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's very kind of you to say so . Let's try some after-dinner wines .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . Sweet wines are my favorite . They always make a great finish to a decisions meal .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you prefer brandy or ports .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excellent choice . I love its smooth flavor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The port is quite exquisite . It must have spent years aging in barrels . Am I right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . You always have a good nose for wines .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Next time we are about to dinner we should try some Canadian ice wine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's made from naturally frozen grapes .
segments.speaker: S1
